auth.signInTitle: Sign in or create an account
auth.signUpCreatorSubtitle: Share your expertise and publish recipes with our community.
auth.signUpVendorSubtitle: Showcase your offerings and connect with hungry households.
auth.codeSentMessage: A new code has been sent to your email.
auth.errorSendCode: Could not send code. Please try again.
auth.invalidCodeMessage: The code you entered is incorrect. Please check your email and try again.

accessibility.title: Accessibility first
accessibility.description: Choose the typography that feels best to you. You can always revisit these settings from your profile later.
accessibility.extraSmallDesc: Compact text for fitting more content on screen.
accessibility.largeDesc: A little extra breathing room for text-heavy screens.
accessibility.extraLargeDesc: Maximum legibility when you need the biggest type.
accessibility.highContrastDesc: Apply a palette with bold contrast for stronger separation between text and background.
accessibility.highContrastLightDesc: Bright backgrounds with crisp accents for maximum daylight readability.
accessibility.highContrastDarkDesc: Inky surfaces and electric accents tuned for night-time clarity.
accessibility.dyslexiaFontDesc: Enable a letterform designed to reduce visual crowding and mirror symmetry.
accessibility.motionSystemDesc: Automatically match your device's reduced motion preference.
accessibility.motionReduceDesc: Minimize animations and motion effects inside the app.
accessibility.motionStandardDesc: Keep the standard motion and animation experience.
accessibility.saveError: We couldn't save your accessibility settings. Please try again.

theme.title: Choose your theme
theme.description: Preview each look to see how Haricot's colors and typography shift across Midnight, Sunrise, and Black Metal.
theme.revisitNote: You can revisit this choice anytime from your profile settings.

dietary.title: Tell us about your diet
dietary.description: Choose any dietary preferences we should keep in mind when making suggestions.
dietary.customDietDescription: Add a label and a short description so we can recognize your unique approach.
dietary.customDietDetailsPlaceholder: Share any guidelines, staples, or ingredients you lean on.
dietary.customDietNameRequired: Please give your custom diet a name so we can keep it in your profile.
dietary.saveError: We couldn't save your dietary preferences. Please try again.

allergies.title: Log allergies
allergies.description: We'll highlight recipes and tasks that need extra care for anyone with food allergies in your household.
allergies.knownAllergiesHelper: Add each allergen separately so we can track them clearly.
allergies.addAllergyHelper: We'll keep this list with your household so everyone can stay safe.
allergies.saveError: We couldn't save your allergy details. Please try again.
allergies.reviewDescription: We'll translate each item into our food codes so recipes and tasks stay accurate.
allergies.reviewTodoNote: TODO: confirm the best food code once matching is ready.
allergies.reviewReminder: Review the suggested matches before continuing so we map everything correctly.
allergies.reviewRequiresAllergies: Tell us at least one allergy so we know what to look up.
allergies.reviewError: We couldn't prepare the allergy matches. Please try again.

household.title: Who's in your household?
household.description: Tell us how many people you typically cook or shop for.
household.chooseSizeDesc: Select the option that fits best.
household.saveError: We couldn't save your household details. Please try again.

code.title: Join an existing household
code.description: If someone in your household already uses Haricot, enter their code below to send a join request.
code.label: Household code
code.enterCodeError: Enter a household code to continue.
code.notFoundError: We couldn't find that code. Double-check it and try again.
code.alreadyInHouseholdError: Leave your current household before joining a new one.
code.alreadyMemberSuccess: You're already part of this household.
code.pendingSuccess: We let this household know you'd like to join. A current member will approve you shortly.
code.sendRequestError: We ran into an issue joining that household. Please try again.

cuisines.title: Favorite cuisines
cuisines.description: Pick the cuisines you reach for most often so we can tailor your experience.
cuisines.saveError: We couldn't save your cuisine preferences. Please try again.

cookingStyles.title: How do you like to cook?
cookingStyles.description: Tell us the techniques and pacing that feel natural in your kitchen.
cookingStyles.saveError: We couldn't save your cooking style preferences. Please try again.

mealPreferences.title: How do you plan meals?
mealPreferences.description: Share how you prep, batch, and serve meals so we can suggest the right workflows.
mealPreferences.saveError: We couldn't save your meal planning preferences. Please try again.

partnerOnboarding.creatorIntroBody: We'll tailor tools to help you publish recipes and connect with cooks.
partnerOnboarding.creatorProfileBody: Share what you teach, what inspires you, and how you'd like to collaborate.
partnerOnboarding.creatorFinishBody: Finish setup to start sharing your work with the Haricot community.
partnerOnboarding.vendorIntroBody: Let's get your storefront ready so households can discover your offerings.
partnerOnboarding.vendorProfileBody: Tell us what you sell, how you fulfill orders, and any specialties.
partnerOnboarding.vendorFinishBody: Complete onboarding to begin showcasing your goods in Haricot.

midnight.name: Midnight
midnight.description: Moody plum surfaces with amber highlights for evening focus.

sunrise.name: Sunrise
sunrise.description: Bright neutrals with cranberry accents for daytime focus.

blackMetal.name: Black Metal
blackMetal.description: High-contrast graphite with ultraviolet sparks for late nights.

classic.name: Classic
classic.description: Warm light backgrounds with deep browns and lush greens for natural elegance.

fifties.name: 1950s
fifties.description: Optimistic pastels and chrome highlights inspired by retro diners.

sixties.name: 1960s
sixties.description: Psychedelic gradients and bold contrasts pulled from mod posters.

nineties.name: 1990s
nineties.description: Electric neons and grayscale pairings for a vaporwave throwback.

highContrastDark.name: High contrast dark
highContrastDark.description: Inky surfaces with bright accents designed for low-light clarity.

highContrastLight.name: High contrast light
highContrastLight.description: Bright backgrounds with bold outlines for maximum separation.

home.title: Home
home.freshProduceDesc: Fruits and berries in your kitchen
home.featuredRecipesDesc: Cook something delicious with what you have
home.revisitOnboardingDesc: Reset your guided setup to review theme and accessibility preferences.
home.noTasks: No tasks yet. Add your first task!
home.webPreviewSubheader: Tap to explore recipe inspiration across the web.

kitchen.title: Kitchen
kitchen.emptyDescription: Start adding ingredients to keep track of what is on hand.

profile.title: Profile
profile.appearanceDesc: Choose your preferred theme. The entire app updates instantly.
profile.accessibilityDesc: Tune text size and fonts to match your reading comfort.
profile.extraSmallDesc: Compact text for fitting more content on screen.
profile.largeDesc: A little extra breathing room for text-heavy screens.
profile.extraLargeDesc: Maximum legibility when you need the biggest type.
profile.highContrastDesc: Swap to a high-contrast theme that sharpens edges and text visibility.
profile.dyslexiaFontDesc: Switch to OpenDyslexic to reduce visual crowding and mirror symmetry.
profile.motionSystemDesc: Automatically match your device's reduced motion preference.
profile.motionReduceDesc: Minimize animations and movement across the interface.
profile.motionStandardDesc: Keep the standard motion and animation experience.
profile.errorSaveTextSize: We couldn't save your text size preference. Please try again.
profile.errorSaveFont: We couldn't save your font preference. Please try again.
profile.errorSaveHighContrast: We couldn't save your high contrast preference. Please try again.
profile.errorSaveMotion: We couldn't save your motion preference. Please try again.
profile.errorLoadProfile: We couldn't load your profile details. Please try again shortly.
profile.languageDesc: Choose your preferred app language. Content updates instantly.

tasks.title: Title *
tasks.errorAdd: Could not add task. Please try again.
tasks.deleteConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this task?

permissions.speechRecognition: This app uses speech recognition to help you quickly add tasks and ingredients by voice.
permissions.microphone: This app needs microphone access to recognize your voice for adding tasks and ingredients.
permissions.photoLibrary: This app needs access to your photo library to attach images to tasks.
permissions.camera: This app needs access to your camera to take photos for tasks.

errors.userMustAuthenticate: User must be authenticated to update profile

lists.title: Lists
lists.emptyState:
No items in your lists yet.
Start adding items to see them organized here.
lists.emptyList: No items in this list yet.
lists.cookAsapDescription: Missing ingredients update automatically when your pantry changes.
lists.cookAsapEmpty: Add a recipe to COOK$ASAP to track what you still need.
lists.standardEmptyMessage: Add recipes to this list to keep them handy.
lists.noListsTitle: You don't have any lists yet
lists.noListsDescription: Create a list to start organizing your recipes.

themeSwitcher.shareCodeRequiredMessage: Please enter a theme share code.
themeSwitcher.shareCodeNotFoundMessage: No theme found with that share code.
themeSwitcher.leaveHighContrastMessage: Choosing a different theme will disable your high-contrast preference.

alerts.successMessage: Your theme has been saved and applied. Share code: {{shareCode}}
alerts.errorMessage: Failed to save theme. Please try again.

colors.title: Colors
colors.overlayDescription: Overlay backgrounds for modals and popups

textPreview.heading: Heading Text
textPreview.body: This is secondary text that appears below headings and in descriptions.
textPreview.muted: Muted text for placeholders and hints

colors.accentDescription: Primary accent color for buttons and highlights
colors.borderDescription: Border color for dividers and outlines
colors.successDescription: Success states, confirmations, and positive feedback
colors.dangerDescription: Error states, warnings, and destructive actions

navigation.title: Navigation Bar
navigation.description: Customize the appearance of your bottom navigation bar. Preview updates in real-time.
navigation.tabIconsDescription: Choose icons for each navigation tab
navigation.showLabelsDescription: Display text labels in navigation items
navigation.iconSizeDescription: Adjust the size of navigation icons
